title: 820-2567, chime no image
message: So I have on the bench and 820-2567 that chimes, and has backlight but no image. I plugged in an external monitor but nothing came up.

title: 820-2567, chime no image
message:
Missing internal/external video at same time, shouldn't be related with LVDS connection.
Confirm USB activity, to be sure board doesn't get stuck after chime.

title: 820-2567, chime no image
message: No USB activity. Light on pen drive is solid. I should pull the board to check the other side. I think someone else has been inside of it cause the CPU fan is unplugged.

title: 820-2567, chime no image
message: taking 1.43A  w/o battery. Is that normal? Haven't worked on a ton of these.

title: 820-2567, chime no image
message: Probably burned up the GPU . The Fan connector is ripped off of the board.

title: 820-2567, chime no image
message: How is VCORE reacting in the first 10s after turning on?
